report.title: Passed

report.bodytext: I had to take a urine test with capabilities of showing the use of cannabis, amphetamine, opioids and benzos. But I don't know the specific type. /n /n Day 1: 20 mg of 2c-i /n Day 2: 20 mg of 2c-i /n Day 4: 12 mg of 5-meo-dipt /n Day 5: Passed the drug test
